comments.body:
I usually process it a bit, but it's not 100% needed I guess.

```suggestion
$ git shortlog -sn --no-merges v0.10.3..v0.10.4
	Tomasz Godzik
	Vadim Chelyshov
	Luigi Frunzio
	Chris Kipp
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +53,57 @@
```
